column3:
なぁに？　あたしよ、シェリーよ！
――いつもと少し雰囲気が違う？
もう！　照れちゃうからやめてよ
column4:
What is it? It's me, Shelly!
- Is there something different about me today?
Oh, stop it! I get embarrassed when you say that.

column3:
アンジェロがね、今年はどうしても
自分だけ先に神殿に向かうって言って――
column4: Angelo, you see, this year he just had to insist on going ahead to the temple by himself...

column3:
何かたくらんでるのがバレバレよねぇ
ふふふ、ホント不器用なんだから
column4:
It's so obvious that you're up to something, isn't it?
Hehehe, you're really clumsy, you know.

column3:
今日はね、とっておきのドレスを着てきたの
髪型も――どう、レディに見える？
column4:
Today, you know, I came dressed in my finest dress.
Even my hairstyle... How do I look, like a lady?

column3:
今日は、その！
君に力を貸してほしくてだな――
column4: Today is the day! I want you to lend me your strength.

column3:
どうだね、この衣装は？
自分なりにあれこれ組み合わせて
イイ感じに見えるよう頑張ってみたのだが
column4: How about this outfit? I did my best to combine various elements and make it look good.

column3:
シェリーちゃんは
後から来ることになってるんだ
きっとおめかししてきてくれるはずだ！
column4: Ms. Shelly is supposed to come later. I'm sure she'll come dressed up!

column3:
いや、あの、神殿のホワイトデーを
盛り上げるために来たんだ
それは間違いないぞ！
column4: Well, you see, I came here to make the Temple's White Day lively. That's definitely true!

column3: よしっ！　これで――よしっ！

あらためて自分の姿を見てみると
――本当にこれでいいのか？
いや、いいはずだ！
最新のモードな俺であるはずだ！
column4:
Upon taking a fresh look at my own appearance,
- Is this really okay?
No, it should be fine!
I should be the epitome of the latest fashion!

column3:
色々と相談に乗ってくれて感謝するよッ！
君も恋に悩むことがあれば
今度は俺が相談に乗ろう！
column4:
I'm grateful that you've been helping me with various consultations! 
If you ever have any troubles with love, I'll be there to listen and offer advice next time!

column3:
今の俺は魅力的だ、今の俺は魅力的だ――
うっ、すまない
ちょっと自己暗示をだね
column4:
I am attractive now, I am attractive now -
Ah, sorry
Let me do a little self-suggestion

column3: こう魔物が増えちゃ、たまらないな
column4: These enemies are multiplying, it's really overwhelming.

column3: 暮らしは厳しくなる一方だよ
もう一度、機会を与えてください――！
きっと次こそはお役に――！
column4: I will definitely be useful next time!

column3: きっと次こそはお役に――！
column4: I will definitely be useful next time!

column3: もう一度、機会を与えてください――！
きっと次こそはお役に――！
column4: I will definitely be useful next time!

column3: きっと次こそはお役に――！
column4: I will definitely be useful next time!

column3:
覚者さま、お会いできて光栄です
ぜひわたしめと主従の契約を――
column4:
Master Arisen, it's an honor to meet you
Please consider making a contract with me as your servant.

column3:
――そうですか、残念です
ではせめてこれをお持ち下さい
column4: Oh, I see. That's too bad. Well, please at least take this with you.

column3:
ああ、覚者さま――
どうか今一度私を――
column4: If you would allow me another chance, Arisen...

column3: 我らはいつも、覚者さまとともに
column4: We will be always by your side, Arisen.

column3:
覚者さま、お力添えの機会
お待ちしています
column4: I await the opportunity to lend you my strength, Arisen.

column3:
覚者さま、どうぞ私にも同伴の許可を
リムストーンからのお声掛けを
お待ちしています
column4: You need only call me from a Riftstone and I will gladly accompany you, Arisen.

column3: 冒険の手助けなら、いつでもいたします
column4: I am ready whenever you should need assistance.

column3: まだ、作業を承っておりません
column4: I have not yet accepted a crafting request.

column3: ご指示をお待ちしています

旅かクラフトのご用命あらば
いつでも動きます
column4: I am ready for crafting or an expedition whenever you wish.

column3: 只今作業中ですので、お待ちください
column4: I am crafting now. Please wait a while.

column3: 完成まで、いましばらくかかります
column4: It will take some time before it is complete.

column3: 集中力を要しますので、会話はまた後ほど
column4: I am concentrating now. I will speak with you later.

column3:
救っていただき、ありがとうございます
次こそは必ずお役に――！
column4: Thank you for saving me. It will not happen again.

column3:
申し訳ありません、覚者さま
精進いたします
column4: I apologize, Arisen. I will devote myself to this task.

column3:
次こそご期待を――
この経験を生かします
column4: I have learned from this experience. Next time I will not fail you.

column3:
うっ――！
マスター、どうか私にチャンスを――！
column4:
Ugh!
Master, please give me a chance!

column3:
おぉ！　お目にかかれて光栄です！
覚者様！！
column4: Oh! I am honored to meet you, Arisen!

column3:
覚者様！　どうか我がマスターに！
私に活躍の機会を！
column4:
Arisen! Please be my master! 
Give me an opportunity to flourish!

column3: 忠誠の心なら、誰にも負けません！
column4:
If the loyalty of the heart is tested,
I will not lose to anyone!

column3:
粉骨砕身！
いかなる困難にも、共に立ち向かう所存！
column4:
Do your best!
No matter what the difficulties, we'll face them together!

column3: 準備万端、何でもやりますよ！
column4: Ready to go, I will do anything!

column3:
マスター！
さぁ！！　何でもお言いつけください！
column4:
Master! 
Come on!! Please say anything!

column3:
冒険の際はぜひお伴を！
作りたいものがあれば、何でもご要望を！
column4:
Please come along when you are on an adventure!
If there is something you want to make, request anything!

column3:
クラフト作業は順調です、マスター！
ご安心を！
column4:
Crafting is going well, Master!
Do not worry!

column3: 気合い十分で作業にかかっています！
column4: It will take plenty of work and fighting spirit!

column3: 心配は要りません、完了まで万事お任せを！
column4: Do not worry, leave it to me to complete it!

column3:
うおおお、マスター！
救って頂き面目次第もありません！！
column4:
Uoooh, Master!
I have no idea how to save you!!

column3:
マスター！！
くううっ――！　必ずやこのご恩に報います！
column4:
Master!!
Wow~! This kindness will surely be repaid!

column3:
異界の狭間に、わざわざ私などのために――！
我がマスターはなんと慈悲深い方だ――！
一層励み、お守りしなければ――
column4:
In the Rift, my Master went out of their way just for someone like me!
How kind and merciful they are!
I must work even harder and protect them...

column3:
あ！　か、覚者さま！
こんにちは――
こんな自分でよければ、お手伝いを――！
column4: If you are fine with someone like me, I will assist you--!

column3:
あ、あの――覚者さま！
自分もぜひ、旅のお伴を――！
column4: Ah, um... Lord Arisen! I would also like to accompany you on your journey!

column3:
あの、覚者さま！
役に立てることがあれば、自分を――！
column4:
Excuse me, Lord Arisen!
If there is anything I can do to be of assistance, please let me know!

column3: 少しでも、お手伝いできれば――
column4: If I can help even a little...

column3: 自分にも何かできるはず――
column4: I should be able to do something too...

column3: ま、まだできてないんです――
column4: W-Well, I haven't been able to yet...

column3: あ、慌てると失敗してしまうので――
column4: Oh, if I panic, I'll end up failing...

column3:
ここをこう――あ、すみません
集中してたもので
column4: I'm sorry for changing this... Ah, excuse me. I was just really focused.

column3:
――うぅ、感激です――！
こんな自分を助けに来てくださるなんて――！
column4:
――Oh, how moved I am――!
To think that someone would come to help someone like me――!

column3:
あぁ――
覚者さまの姿を見て、安心しました――
失敗してごめんなさい
column4:
Ah...
I feel relieved when I see the Arisen's figure.
I'm sorry for the failure.

column3:
良かった――覚者さま！
あれきり会えなくなるかと――
column4:
It was good -- Master Arisen!
I was afraid I wouldn't be able to see you again --
